summary: Tony: It’s kind of cold. Clint:  Here, take my jacket. Tony: I love you. Clint [dramatically]: We are such the *flips hair*...
body:
Tony: It’s kind of cold.

Clint:  Here, take my jacket.

Tony: I love you.

Clint [dramatically]: We are such the *flips hair* perfect couple.

Wade: I’m cold, too.

Nathan: Well damn, Wade, I can’t control the weather!

Tony: I love you.

Clint [dramatically]: We are such the *flips hair* perfect couple.

tags: writers block is still eating me alive so have an excerpt im never gonna do anything with!!
summary:
The guilt and fear never leaves Tony, never quells its insistent presence in his lungs, never lets him recover. 
(Even after the...
body:
The guilt and fear never leaves Tony, never quells its insistent presence in his lungs, never lets him recover.

(Even after the world is pieced back together, after he brings Peter home with hopeless tears and burnt and shaking hands.)

And it’s worse when he’s not working, when his mind can wander back, further and further, to Titan and the heavy air there, to dust sticking to the blood on his hands.

He tries to wash it away, all the soot and the memories, but they only spread further up his wrists and arms, shrouding him in suffering and the reminder that he wasn’t strong enough.

(It’s worse when Peter doesn’t check in before and after patrols, fear curdling in his stomach and freezing the blood in his veins because he can’t lose him again.)

reblog.comment:

(It’s worse when Peter doesn’t check in before and after patrols, fear curdling in his stomach and freezing the blood in his veins because he can’t lose him again.)

trail.content_raw:
The guilt and fear never leaves Tony, never quells its insistent presence in his lungs, never lets him recover.

(Even after the world is pieced back together, after he brings Peter home with hopeless tears and burnt and shaking hands.)

And it’s worse when he’s not working, when his mind can wander back, further and further, to Titan and the heavy air there, to dust sticking to the blood on his hands.

He tries to wash it away, all the soot and the memories, but they only spread further up his wrists and arms, shrouding him in suffering and the reminder that he wasn’t strong enough.

(It’s worse when Peter doesn’t check in before and after patrols, fear curdling in his stomach and freezing the blood in his veins because he can’t lose him again.)
trail.content:
The guilt and fear never leaves Tony, never quells its insistent presence in his lungs, never lets him recover.

(Even after the world is pieced back together, after he brings Peter home with hopeless tears and burnt and shaking hands.)

And it’s worse when he’s not working, when his mind can wander back, further and further, to Titan and the heavy air there, to dust sticking to the blood on his hands.

He tries to wash it away, all the soot and the memories, but they only spread further up his wrists and arms, shrouding him in suffering and the reminder that he wasn’t strong enough.

(It’s worse when Peter doesn’t check in before and after patrols, fear curdling in his stomach and freezing the blood in his veins because he can’t lose him again.)

summary: You wanna be sad with me real quick? Because I realized that at the beginning of IW, Tony tells Pepper that he had a dream about...
question: You wanna be sad with me real quick? Because I realized that at the beginning of IW, Tony tells Pepper that he had a dream about their son. Meaning that he had finally gotten past the awful dreams he had been having in IM3. He had finally gotten to a better mental place (which believe me is tough) and then he got dragged back into what gave him PTSD in the first place.
answer:
I mean and he lost his son-figure. That definitely happened too

Why can’t these directors let my damn boy be happy i s2g

summary: I told @emilyevanston  that I had this song stuck in my head and it went really well with Tony...  A buzzed Tony would most...
caption:
I told @emilyevanston  that I had this song stuck in my head and it went really well with Tony… 

A buzzed Tony would most likely like this. 
I am quite happy with how I played with the visual representations of “ass” and “cash”.

It might come across as douchey because it’s the perspective of a playboy billionaire :P Other than that, I hope you enjoy it.

blog.name: shinysoroka
blog.title: Where the brave live forever
blog.description:
This blogger loves and respects Thor Odinson. And cats. Cats are nice.

She/her, +18.

summary: Contrary to popular belief, Thor doesn't text in all caps in a Shakespearean tone. He's still not entirely used to the whole...
body: Contrary to popular belief, Thor doesn’t text in all caps in a Shakespearean tone. He’s still not entirely used to the whole system, though, so his texts contain no abbreviations, no emojis and they often sound like actual letters. The team is mostly amused by this, especially considering that Tony texts like a fifteen year old girl on a sugar high.

blog.name: sonderscurse
blog.title: Summertime Sadness🌹
blog.description: My name’s Sunny and I snatch that aesthetic day and night. Both my icon and header image are pictures taken by me. I’m into Marvel stuff and Star Wars among many things, and I watch a lot of shows. I like to think I’m easy to talk to. Send your rants to me and I’ll send you pictures of my cats to make things better. To sweeten the deal, I have two cats.

blog.description: Read and Write. Harry Potter. Supernatural. Big Time Rush. X-Men. Sam and Dean. Jared Padalecki and Jensen Ackles. James Maslow and Kendall Schmidt. James McAvoy and Michael Fassbender. Tom Hiddleston. The Avengers. Struggling to survive Law School.

summary: Soooo....
title: Soooo....
body:
Nobody is gonna talk about the longing in Steve´s eyes when he looked at Vision and Wanda together when he first see them and inside the quinjet…

Like he knows what it´s like to be in love and to be together with your loved one…

And also how he looks at Wanda when Vision propositions killing him to destroy the stone…

Like he knows what costs to sacrifice a love for the greater good and he can´t bear the thought of what happened to him and Tony happen to them.

summary: Learning curve
title: Learning curve
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2vDf8t1

by withered

“Is the greater good gonna have to deal with your whiny ass for the rest of the night?”

“You like my whiny ass just fine,” Tony remarked, wiggling his brows.

Bucky Barnes would have flirted back, that much he knows, but all the soldier manages is a deadpan reply, “It is the only organic thing I eat.”

Words: 1845, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 17 of Who’s been lovin’ you good?

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark

summary:
Gamora: I’m Gamora. And this is Drax. And these two little hellraisers are Rocket and Peter Quill.

 Quill: [to Tony] Hey, hot...
body:
Gamora: I’m Gamora. And this is Drax. And these two little hellraisers are Rocket and Peter Quill.

Quill: [to Tony] Hey, hot stuff.

Tony: [stunned] M-m-m-me? Um… Hello.

summary: Joy to the Fishes in the Deep Blue Sea
title: Joy to the Fishes in the Deep Blue Sea
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Kt4JW3

by MotherOfBeardedDragons

Thor discovers that Midgardians put pet fish on display in aquariums and is thrilled. He immerses himself in learning about marine biology so that he might have his own aquarium. The rest of the Avengers are supportive of their friend’s new hobby.

Words: 2296, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

body:
